mapper.select: SELECT cat.name as catName, childs.product_name as productName, childs.product_pic as productPic, childs.price, childs.cost_price AS costPrice, childs.buy_number AS buyNumber, childs.score, childs.product_score AS productScore, childs.product_amount AS totalAmount, childs.activity AS activityId, childs.aisle_id AS aisleId, aisle.x as aisleX, aisle.y as aisleY FROM food_order_childs childs LEFT JOIN food_product_cat cat ON childs.product_cat_id = cat.id LEFT JOIN food_machine_aisle aisle ON childs.mac_id = aisle.mac_id AND childs.product_id = aisle.product_id where childs.order_id=#{orderId}
